alert.note: Alert for Macon; Peach; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:56AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Macon, southwestern Peach and southeastern Taylor Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 655 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Winchester, or 8 miles north of Oglethorpe, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Butler, Montezuma, Marshallville, Reynolds, Ideal, Whitewater State Park, Rupert, Garden Valley, Winchester, Hicks and Potterville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
